event.doc_name: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

evidence.text: Due to Mississippi's failure to properly fund, staff, and maintain its prisons, Plaintiffs are currently being confined in conditions which pose serious and imminent dangers to their safety and well-being.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Mississippi's failure to properly fund, staff, and maintain prisons leading to dangerous conditions

evidence.text: The shortage of correctional officers on staff at Parchman creates and enables an environment in which the inmates at Parchman are particularly susceptible to violence, gang influence, and prolonged states of anarchy.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Shortage of correctional officers causing violence, gang influence, and prolonged anarchy

evidence.text: Since January 1, 2020, at least nine inmates have died at Parchman, and at least two other inmates have escaped from Parchman.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Nine inmate deaths and two escapes since January 1, 2020

evidence.text: A slew of disturbing images and videos have surfaced showing that inmates are being required to defecate in plastic bags inside of their cells because their toilets are not functional.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Non-functional toilets requiring inmates to defecate in plastic bags

evidence.text: The prisons have failed to provide the basic necessities, such as a place to sleep. In Parchman, the units are subject to flooding. Black mold festers. Rats and mice infest the prison.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Flooding, black mold, and infestation of rats/mice in prison units

evidence.text: Parchman had a 42% staff vacancy rate.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: 42% staff vacancy rate at Parchman as of January 2019

evidence.text: At the end of October 2019, the staffing ratio at Parchman (12.5 prisoners per correctional officer) was worse than Alabama's.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Inadequate staffing ratios (12.5 prisoners per correctional officer) exceeding Alabama's ratio

args.reason: All checklist items (Factual_Basis_of_Case) are fully extracted with 7 distinct values from the fully visited Class Action Complaint document. No further documents need to be processed as the factual basis is comprehensively covered.
All checklist items (Factual_Basis_of_Case) are fully extracted with 7 distinct values from the fully visited Class Action Complaint document. No further documents or extraction is required.
